org.waarp.icap

Class IcapScanFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.icap.IcapScanFile

  • public class IcapScanFile
extends Object
    IcapScanFile command to ask an ICAP server to scan a file through network ICAP protocol.

    Options:
    -file path_to_file
    -to hostname
    [-port port, default 1344]
    -service name | -model name
    [-previewSize size, default none]
    [-blockSize size, default 8192]
    [-receiveSize size, default 65536]
    [-maxSize size, default MAX_INTEGER]
    [-timeout in_ms, default equiv to 10 min]
    [-errorMove path | -errorDelete | -sendOnError]
    [-ignoreNetworkError]
    [-ignoreTooBigFileError]
    [-keyPreview key -stringPreview string, default none]
    [-key204 key -string204 string, default none]
    [-key200 key -string200 string, default none]
    [-stringHttp string, default none]
    [-logger DEBUG|INFO|WARN|ERROR, default none]

    Exit with values:
    • 0: Scan OK
    • 1: Bad arguments
    • 2: ICAP protocol error
    • 3: Network error
    • 4: Scan KO
    • 5: Scan KO but post action required in error

      • getIcapScanFileArgs

        public static IcapScanFile getIcapScanFileArgs(String[] args)
                                        throws IcapException
        If file argument are -file EICARTEST, then a EICAR test file will be sent.

        "-file path_to_file
        -to hostname
        [-port port, default 1344]
        -service name | -model name
        [-previewSize size, default none]
        [-blockSize size, default 8192]
        [-receiveSize size, default 65536]
        [-maxSize size, default MAX_INTEGER]
        [-timeout in_ms, default equiv to 10 min]
        [-errorMove path | -errorDelete | -sendOnError]
        [-ignoreNetworkError]
        [-ignoreTooBigFileError]
        [-keyPreview key -stringPreview string, default none]
        [-key204 key -string204 string, default none]
        [-key200 key -string200 string, default none]
        [-stringHttp string, default none]
        [-logger DEBUG|INFO|WARN|ERROR, default none]"

        Parameters:
        args - must be already replaced values (getReplacedValue)
        Returns:
        the IcapScanFile
        Throws:
        IcapException - if an error occurs during argument parsing

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        If file argument are -file EICARTEST, then a EICAR test file will be sent.

        "-file path_to_file
        -to hostname
        [-port port, default 1344]
        -service name | -model name
        [-previewSize size, default none]
        [-blockSize size, default 8192]
        [-receiveSize size, default 65536]
        [-maxSize size, default MAX_INTEGER]
        [-timeout in_ms, default equiv to 10 min]
        [-errorMove path | -errorDelete | -sendOnError]
        [-ignoreNetworkError]
        [-ignoreTooBigFileError]
        [-keyPreview key -stringPreview string, default none]
        [-key204 key -string204 string, default none]
        [-key200 key -string200 string, default none]
        [-stringHttp string, default none]
        [-logger DEBUG|INFO|WARN|ERROR, default none]"


        Exit with values:
        • 0: Scan OK
        • 1: Bad arguments
        • 2: ICAP protocol error
        • 3: Network error
        • 4: Scan KO
        • 5: Scan KO but post action required in error
        Parameters:
        args - to get parameters from

      • scanFile

        public static int scanFile(String[] model,
                           String[] args)
        If file argument are -file EICARTEST, then a EICAR test file will be sent.

        "-file path_to_file
        -to hostname
        [-port port, default 1344]
        Not -service name | -model name (should be set through Model)
        [-previewSize size, default none]
        [-blockSize size, default 8192]
        [-receiveSize size, default 65536]
        [-maxSize size, default MAX_INTEGER]
        [-timeout in_ms, default equiv to 10 min]
        [-errorMove path | -errorDelete | -sendOnError]
        [-ignoreNetworkError]
        [-ignoreTooBigFileError]
        [-keyPreview key -stringPreview string, default none]
        [-key204 key -string204 string, default none]
        [-key200 key -string200 string, default none]
        [-stringHttp string, default none]
        [-logger DEBUG|INFO|WARN|ERROR, default none]"

        Parameters:
        model - default model to apply in addition to parameters
        args - to get parameters from
        Returns:
        0 if OK, 1 if arguments are incorrect, 2 if an issue occurs during ICAP protool, 3 if a nework error occurs, 4 if scan KO, 5 if the post actions are in error while scan is KO

      • scanFile

        public static int scanFile(String[] args)
        If file argument are -file EICARTEST, then a EICAR test file will be sent.

        "-file path_to_file
        -to hostname
        [-port port, default 1344]
        -service name | -model name [-previewSize size, default none]
        [-blockSize size, default 8192]
        [-receiveSize size, default 65536]
        [-maxSize size, default MAX_INTEGER]
        [-timeout in_ms, default equiv to 10 min]
        [-errorMove path | -errorDelete | -sendOnError]
        [-ignoreNetworkError]
        [-ignoreTooBigFileError]
        [-keyPreview key -stringPreview string, default none]
        [-key204 key -string204 string, default none]
        [-key200 key -string200 string, default none]
        [-stringHttp string, default none]
        [-logger DEBUG|INFO|WARN|ERROR, default none]"

        Parameters:
        args - to get parameters from
        Returns:
        0 if OK, 1 if arguments are incorrect, 2 if an issue occurs during ICAP protool, 3 if a nework error occurs, 4 if scan KO, 5 if the post actions are in error while scan is KO

      • scanFile

        public final int scanFile()
                   throws IcapException,
                          IOException
        Scan a file through ICAP antivirus server from IcapScanFile
        Returns:
        0 if scan is OK, 1 if the file is infected
        Throws:
        IcapException - if an error occurs during connection or ICAP protocol
        IOException - if the file is infected and a post error action is in error
